channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Bad damage to pavement, 17th June
item.description:
The pavement outside 3 Dark Lane is in an appalling state of disrepair, with multiple deep potholes, constituting a serious trip hazard, as well as being very unsightly. This problem has been there for 10+ years and has been reported before, but nothing ever gets done.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Dark Lane, Kingsditch, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Other damage to pavement i.e. cobbles, raised mound/surface

item.title: Trolly in brook which is causing an obstruction, 17th June
item.description:
Trolly has been dumped and has been collecting debris which will cause an obstruction and pollution problem.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Mill Lane, Brockworth, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Light sensor is not detecting vehicles problem, 17th June
item.description:
Customer reports that works in the location were completed recently, but the signs (marked "Core Highways" on the reverse) remain in place. These are being frequently kicked over and they are concerned that it is only a matter of time before they end up in the road. Please can they be collected asap.
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Light sensor is not detecting vehicles

item.title: Deep wide pot hole, 17th June
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Harp Hill, Cheltenham

item.title: Yet another road closure, after this stretch of road has only just been reopened- permit granted seems excessive for a hole dug on a driveway by the road - it’s not even on the road and very frustrating given existing disruptions in Bishops Cleeve - lack of coordination & consideration to residents, 17th June

item.title: Road has collapsed next to drain, 16th June
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 42, Orchard Way, Wymans Brook, Cheltenham

item.title: Giant Hogweed along the waterway, 16th June
item.description:
